attributes.action: Stop intra company transfer scheme under Work Permit (Tier 2)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Under this scheme employers are not required to advertise vacancies in the UK if they choose their staff from the organisation’s overseas offices to fill them.

It is a loophole in the immigration system which lets companies import non-EU staff into the UK without having to first advertise those jobs domestically, should be closed as
it is bypassing UK workers, at a time of ongoing joblessness, due to lax rules on intra-company transfers.

rejection.details: Please provide a full name on your petition and resubmit.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
